product_requirements_document.executive_summary: AI-powered personal finance app specifically designed for recently laid-off individuals who need to access 401K funds strategically while continuing to build wealth through micro-investing and community support. The app addresses the critical gap in specialized financial guidance for unemployment scenarios, combining 401K strategy optimization with continued wealth building and emotional support.
product_requirements_document.problem_statement: Recently laid-off individuals face immediate financial pressure and may need to tap into 401K savings for survival, but they also need to continue building wealth through investments even during unemployment. Current solutions are either too generic, too expensive, or not specialized for unemployment scenarios.
success_criteria: Help users preserve 401K wealth while meeting immediate needs
Enable continued wealth building during unemployment
Provide emotional support and reduce isolation
Integrate financial stability with job search success

solution_architecture.frontend_stack: Next.js 14+ (App Router), Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui components, Zustand state management
solution_architecture.backend_stack: Next.js API routes, NeonDB (PostgreSQL), Prisma ORM, Redis caching
solution_architecture.ai_ml_stack: Groq LLM API, Pinecone vector database, LangSmith prompt management
solution_architecture.financial_integrations: Plaid API, Alpha Vantage market data, IEX Cloud, CoinGecko crypto data
solution_architecture.infrastructure: Vercel hosting, Vercel Edge Network, Sentry monitoring, Axiom logging

user_stories: As a laid-off individual, I want to calculate 401K withdrawal options so that I can minimize penalties and preserve wealth
As a user, I want to see real-time tax implications so that I can make informed decisions
As a user, I want personalized recommendations so that I can choose the best strategy for my situation
acceptance_criteria: Calculator provides accurate tax and penalty calculations within 5% of professional advisor
Multiple withdrawal strategies presented with clear pros and cons
Personalized recommendations based on user's financial situation and goals

user_stories: As a user, I want personalized financial guidance so that I can make better decisions during crisis
As a user, I want emotional support so that I can maintain mental health during unemployment
As a user, I want crisis-specific advice so that I can navigate my unique situation
acceptance_criteria: AI provides helpful responses 80%+ of the time based on user feedback
Responses are personalized to user's specific financial situation
Emotional support is provided alongside practical guidance
